prompt: Can you recommend an extension that provides live translation with subtitles?

hidden_queries: browser extension live translation with subtitles extension
extension for live translation and subtitles for video/calls subtitles live translation
metadata.generated_search_query: browser extension live translation with subtitles extension

sources.title: TranslateSub - Chrome Web Store
sources.snippet: Real-time audio & video transcription and translation with subtitles This extension automatically transcribes audio from web pages (including videos and live streams) into real-time subtitles while providing translations in 75 languages.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are a few extensions/tools that give live translation with real-time subtitles you can try — with a skeptical eye on capabilities and limitations: Good candidates (browser-based) TranslateSub (Chrome) – auto-transcribes and translates audio on web pages (videos/live streams) into subtitles in ~75 languages. Works on many sites but ratings are middling. Chrome Web Store

sources.title: Live Translation: Real-Time Video & Audio Translator
sources.snippet: Overview AI-powered real-time translation tool for videos, live streams, and meetings, supporting 50+ languages. Break language barriers effortlessly with Tellus AI, your Chrome extension for instant video translation from any language into yours so that you can unlock the power of communication.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Live Translation: Real-Time Video & Audio Translator (Tellus AI) – real-time translation for videos, meetings, and audio across 50+ languages. Requires account/minutes. Chrome Web Store

sources.title: ViiTor Translate - AI Translation & Real-Time Bilingual Subtitles ...
sources.snippet: The ViiTor translation provides translation for live audio & video, realizing bilingual subtitle functions. " ViiTor Translator Plugin provides real-time audio transcription and translation for live audio/video streaming, online video, and online meetings, offering bilingual subtitles. ⭐️ Core Features. - The extension recognises the audio content on the page and converts it to the ...

citation_mappings.claim_text: ViiTor Translate – AI Translation & Real-Time Bilingual Subtitles – real-time audio/video transcription + bilingual subtitles; supports ~19 languages. Chrome Web Store

sources.title: Vi Subtitle: Add Live Captions to Any Webpage - Chrome Web Store
sources.snippet: Enjoy unlimited use with no time limits How to use: - Add the extension to your Chrome browser - Go to the webpage you want to add live captions to - Open the pop-up (loads model on first start) and switch on Live Caption - Select origin language or target translation language, done Supported languages: English, Chinese, Hindi, Spanish, French ...

citation_mappings.claim_text: Vi Subtitle (Chrome) – live captions with optional translation overlay for any tab audio; free plan available. Chrome Web Store
Felo Subtitles (Edge/Chrome) – real-time transcription/translation for web meetings and live streams; supports major platforms like YouTube Live & Google Meet. Microsoft Edge Addons

sources.title: Real-Time Bilingual Video & Audio Translation – SonicCaption ...
sources.snippet: Real-time subtitles for any tab with audio Dual subtitles: original language + translation shown together Works with video and audio (no need for built-in subtitles) AI-powered transcription & translation for high accuracy Low latency, suitable for live streams, meetings, and classes Overlay style designed to stay readable without blocking the ...

citation_mappings.claim_text: Real-time Bilingual Video & Audio Translation (Edge add-on) – AI-powered dual subtitles for live streams, meetings, classes in many languages. Microsoft Edge Addons

sources.title: Live Subtitles – Bilingual Captions & Speech Translator
sources.snippet: Live Subtitles is an automatic real-time subtitle generator that converts any audio or video into text and live translation. The app instantly transcribes speech and displays bilingual subtitles, showing both the original language and the translated text at the same time. Subtitles appear as a floating overlay on top of any app — videos, calls, live streams, social media, podcasts, online ...

citation_mappings.claim_text: Notes and limitations Many extensions rely on third-party AI or limited free minutes and may not handle complex audio well (overlapping speakers, music). Security/privacy varies (local vs cloud processing). Check permissions before install. True live captioning for calls (Zoom/Teams) without built-in support often needs a desktop app or platform feature, not just a browser addon. Microsoft Store

sources.title: Live Subtitles – Bilingual Captions & Speech Translator
sources.snippet: Live Subtitles is an automatic real-time subtitle generator that converts any audio or video into text and live translation. The app instantly transcribes speech and displays bilingual subtitles, showing both the original language and the translated text at the same time. Subtitles appear as a floating overlay on top of any app — videos, calls, live streams, social media, podcasts, online ...

citation_mappings.claim_text: If you want something system-wide (not just a browser) that overlays translation for all apps (calls, videos, streams), the Live Subtitles app on Windows captures system audio and displays bilingual captions anywhere on screen — it’s not a browser extension per se but closer to what you asked for. Microsoft Store
